review: HAD TO UPGRADE MY INTERNET SPEED TO STREAM, VS GOOGLE TV STREAMED JUST FINE ON SLOWER SPEED.... GLAD I DID THOUGH. GOOD PIECE OF EQUIPMENT WORTH EVERY PENNY IF YOUR A PRIME USER LIKE MYSELF.
author: Kyle lewis

review: Works great for me. Able to stream all my favorites with no problems.
author: Herbert Samuels

review: I love the Fire TV Stick. I already have Amazon Prime and a friend of mind knew I was saving up for a Smart TV. She told me she purchased the Fire TV Stick and now she wishes she never paid so much money for her Smart TV because with the Fire TV Stick  can convert a basic HDTV Flat Screen into a Smart TV! She saved me so much money and I am so glad I purchased it. It was easy to set up and I am able to listen to music and watch movies! It has frozen up on occasion so do not hit the buttons too fast. All you have to do is switch back to your TV and wait about 10 secs. It will correct itself. But besides that, I am completely satisfied.
author: A. Y. Williams

review: Do you have to have internet with this fire stick
author: Eddrina Dewhart

review: Awesome...who needs cable when you have a firrstick?!!
author: Stedman Clay

review: Everything I expected and then some! 😊

review: More than exceeded our expectations! Easy to install, easier to use!
